entry.value: # search algorithm%%00010search_speed speed1%%00010aco_ants 20%%00010flip_amide_bonds 0%%00010flip_planar_n 1%%00010force_flipped_bonds_planarity 0%%00010force_planar_bond_rotation 1%%00010rescore_mode simplex%%00010flip_ring_corners 0%%00010%%00010# scoring functions%%00010# Intermolecular (protein-ligand interaction scoring)%%00010scoring_function chemplp%%00010outside_binding_site_penalty 50.0%%00010enable_sulphur_acceptors 0%%00010# Intramolecular ligand scoring%%00010ligand_intra_score clash2%%00010chemplp_clash_include_14 1%%00010chemplp_clash_include_HH 0%%00010%%00010# input%%00010protein_file protein.mol2%%00010ligand_file ligands.mol2%%00010%%00010# output%%00010output_dir results%%00010%%00010# write single mol2 files (e.g. for RMSD calculation)%%00010write_multi_mol2 1%%00010%%00010# binding site definition%%00010bindingsite_center 0.0 0.0 0.0%%00010bindingsite_radius 1.0%%00010%%00010# cluster algorithm%%00010cluster_structures 10%%00010cluster_rmsd 2.0%%00010%%00010# write %%00010write_ranking_links 0%%00010write_protein_bindingsite 1%%00010write_protein_conformations 1%%00010write_protein_splitted 1%%00010write_merged_protein 0%%00010####%%00010
